languages.text: Клинок, найденный на дрейфующем корабле, экипаж которого был вырезан загадочным ксеносом. Если держать его рукоять, оплетенную теплой, будто еще живой, кожей, в ушах слышатся вопли гибнущих людей.
A blade found on a drifting ship whose crew had been slaughtered by a mysterious xenos. Holding its hilt braided with warm, still-living skin, your ears ring with the lamentations of the dying.
languages.original_text: Клинок, найденный на дрейфующем корабле, экипаж которого был вырезан загадочным ксеносом. Если держать его рукоять, оплетенную теплой, будто еще живой, кожей, в ушах слышатся вопли гибнущих людей.

traits.locale_text: A blade found on a drifting ship whose crew had been slaughtered by a mysterious xenos. When you hold its hilt braided with warm, still-living skin, you ears ring with the cries of the dying.
A blade found on a drifting ship whose crew had been slaughtered by a mysterious xenos. When you hold its hilt braided with warm, still-living skin, you ears ring with the cries of the dying.

A blade found on a drifting ship whose crew had been slaughtered by a mysterious xenos. Holding its hilt braided with warm, still-living skin, your ears ring with the lamentations of the dying.

languages.text: 这把战刀是在一艘漂流的飞船上发现的，所有船员都遭到了异形的屠杀。它的刀柄上包裹着依然有生命的皮肤，当握紧刀柄时，你的耳中会传来垂死的哀鸣。
languages.original_text: A blade found on a drifting ship whose crew had been slaughtered by a mysterious xenos. Holding its hilt braided with warm, still-living skin, your ears ring with the lamentations of the dying.

traits.locale_text: 这把战刀是在一艘漂流的飞船上发现的，所有船员都遭到了异形的屠杀。它的刀柄上包裹着依然有生命的皮肤，当握紧刀柄时，你的耳中会传来垂死的哀鸣。

languages.text: 謎のゼノに乗組員を虐殺された漂流船で発見された刃物。まだ生きているかのような温かい皮で編まれた柄を持つと、死にゆく者たちの嘆きが耳に響く。
languages.original_text: A blade found on a drifting ship whose crew had been slaughtered by a mysterious xenos. Holding its hilt braided with warm, still-living skin, your ears ring with the lamentations of the dying.

traits.locale_text: 謎のゼノに乗組員を虐殺された漂流船で発見された刃物。まだ生きているかのような温かい皮で編まれた柄を持つと、死にゆく者たちの嘆きが耳に響く。

languages.text: Una hoja encontrada en una nave a la deriva cuya tripulación fue masacrada por xenos misteriosos. Al sujetar su empuñadura, trenzada con piel cálida y viva, tus oídos retumban con los lamentos de los moribundos.
languages.original_text: A blade found on a drifting ship whose crew had been slaughtered by a mysterious xenos. Holding its hilt braided with warm, still-living skin, your ears ring with the lamentations of the dying.

traits.locale_text: Una hoja encontrada en una nave a la deriva cuya tripulación fue masacrada por xenos misteriosos. Al sujetar su empuñadura, trenzada con piel cálida y viva, tus oídos retumban con los lamentos de los moribundos.

languages.text: Une lame trouvée sur un vaisseau à la dérive dont l'équipage a été massacré par de mystérieux xénos. Celui qui se saisit de son manche couvert d'une peau vivante encore tiède au toucher entend les lamentations des mourants.
languages.original_text: A blade found on a drifting ship whose crew had been slaughtered by a mysterious xenos. Holding its hilt braided with warm, still-living skin, your ears ring with the lamentations of the dying.

traits.locale_text: Une lame trouvée sur un vaisseau à la dérive dont l'équipage a été massacré par de mystérieux xénos. Celui qui se saisit de son manche couvert d'une peau vivante encore tiède au toucher entend les lamentations des mourants.

languages.text: Eine auf einem dahintreibenden Schiff gefundene Klinge. Die Crew wurde von einem mysteriösen Xenos getötet. Wenn du seinen Griff mit warmer, noch lebender Haut umfasst, hörst du das Jammern der Sterbenden.
languages.original_text: A blade found on a drifting ship whose crew had been slaughtered by a mysterious xenos. Holding its hilt braided with warm, still-living skin, your ears ring with the lamentations of the dying.

traits.locale_text: Eine auf einem dahintreibenden Schiff gefundene Klinge. Die Crew wurde von einem mysteriösen Xenos getötet. Wenn du seinen Griff mit warmer, noch lebender Haut umfasst, hörst du das Jammern der Sterbenden.

languages.text: Mürettebatı gizemli bir zeno tarafından katledilmiş, uçsuzda başıboş sürüklenen bir gemide bulunan bir kılıç. Sıcak ve hâlâ canlı deriyle örülmüş kabzasını tutarken kulakların ölenlerin ağıtlarıyla çınlıyor.
languages.original_text: A blade found on a drifting ship whose crew had been slaughtered by a mysterious xenos. Holding its hilt braided with warm, still-living skin, your ears ring with the lamentations of the dying.
